mapper.sql: SELECT ord.id AS ord_id, ord.order_number AS ord_order_number, ord.completion_date AS ord_completion_date, ord.created_at AS ord_created_at, ord.updated_at AS ord_updated_at, ord.invalid AS ord_invalid, cus.id AS cus_id, cus.customer_id AS cus_customer_id, cus.code AS cus_code, cus.name AS cus_name, cus.postal_code AS cus_postal_code, cus.first_address AS cus_first_address, cus.second_address AS cus_second_address, cus.third_address AS cus_third_address, cus.phone_number AS cus_phone_number, empH.e_id AS empH_id, empH.e_employee_id AS empH_employee_id, empH.e_username AS empH_username, empH.e_name AS empH_name, empH.d_id AS dep_id, empH.d_code AS dep_code, empH.d_name AS dep_name, empH.d_invalid AS dep_invalid, ordD.o_order_number AS ordD_order_number, ordD.o_detail_id AS ordD_detail_id, ordD.o_order_quantity AS ordD_order_quantity, ordD.o_completion_date AS ordD_completion_date, ordD.o_created_at AS ordD_created_at, ordD.o_updated_at AS ordD_updated_at, ordD.o_invalid AS ordD_invalid, ordD.i_id AS ite_id, ordD.i_item_id AS ite_item_id, ordD.i_code AS ite_code, ordD.i_name AS ite_name, ordD.i_unit_price AS ite_unit_price, amount.order_amount_total AS order_amount_total FROM orders ord INNER JOIN customers_history cus ON ord.customer_history_id = cus.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT e.id AS e_id, e.employee_id AS e_employee_id, e.username AS e_username, e.name AS e_name, d.id AS d_id, d.code AS d_code, d.name AS d_name, d.invalid AS d_invalid FROM employees_history e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.id ) empH ON ord.employee_history_id = empH.e_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT o.order_number AS order_number, SUM(i.unit_price * o.order_quantity) AS order_amount_total FROM orders_details o INNER JOIN items_history i ON o.item_history_id = i.id GROUP BY o.order_number ) amount ON ord.order_number = amount.order_number LEFT JOIN ( SELECT o.order_number AS o_order_number, o.detail_id AS o_detail_id, o.order_quantity AS o_order_quantity, o.completion_date AS o_completion_date, o.created_at AS o_created_at, o.updated_at AS o_updated_at, o.invalid AS o_invalid, i.id AS i_id, i.item_id AS i_item_id, i.code AS i_code, i.name AS i_name, i.unit_price AS i_unit_price FROM orders_details o INNER JOIN items_history i ON o.item_history_id = i.id ) ordD ON ord.order_number = ordD.o_order_number
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) FROM orders GROUP BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_number, customer_history_id, employee_history_id ) VALUES ( #{orderNumber}, #{customerHistory.id}, #{employeeHistory.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET invalid = 1, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
